empty.title: No Roadmap Yet
empty.description: Generate an AI-powered roadmap that understands your project's target audience and creates a strategic feature plan.

actions.addFeatureTooltip: Add a new feature to the roadmap
actions.deleteConfirmation: This will permanently remove "{{title}}" from your roadmap.

header.analysisSummary: Analyzed {{competitors}} competitors with {{painPoints}} pain points identified

feature.competitorInsightDescription: This feature addresses competitor pain points

competitorAnalysis.title: Enable Competitor Analysis?
competitorAnalysis.description: Enhance your roadmap with insights from competitor products
competitorAnalysis.identifies: Identifies 3-5 main competitors based on your project type
competitorAnalysis.searches: Searches app stores, forums, and social media for user feedback and pain points
competitorAnalysis.suggests: Suggests features that address gaps in competitor products
competitorAnalysis.privacyText: This feature will perform web searches to gather competitor information. Your project name and type will be used in search queries. No code or sensitive data is shared.
competitorAnalysis.optionalText: You can generate a roadmap without competitor analysis if you prefer. The roadmap will still be based on your project structure and best practices.

existingAnalysis.title: Competitor Analysis Options
existingAnalysis.description: This project has an existing competitor analysis from {{date}}
existingAnalysis.useExistingDescription: Reuse the competitor insights you already have. Faster and no additional web searches.
existingAnalysis.runNewDescription: Perform fresh web searches to get updated competitor information. Takes longer.
existingAnalysis.skipDescription: Generate roadmap without any competitor insights.

viewResults.title: Competitor Analysis Results
viewResults.description: Analyzed {{count}} competitors to identify market gaps and opportunities
